caption:
This photograph captures a bustling bar scene set in a ski lodge. The setting is cozy and rustic, with exposed wooden beams and a variety of ski-related decorations adorning the walls and ceilings, including flags and large animal portraits, notably of a lion. 

The bar area is vibrant and appears fully equipped, with liquor bottles lined up and a bartender in action. Behind the counter, there is a bar staff serving drinks and interacting with the customers. A television is mounted up high, showing a sports event, adding to the lively atmosphere.

Several groups of people are scattered throughout the scene, mostly dressed in casual winter or ski attire, suggesting this might be a setting frequented by skiers and snowboarders. The patrons are engaged in conversations or enjoying drinks and snacks. Some individuals are seated at unique, round wooden tables, while others are at the bar on wooden stools, sipping on their beverages.

The furniture is notably rustic and wooden, fitting the lodge theme, with tables and chairs that are sturdy and made of thick, unpolished wood. The flooring is also wooden, enhancing the warm, inviting atmosphere of the lodge bar.

Overall, the photograph depicts a lively social scene within a ski resort, where people relax and unwind after skiing, enjoying the comfort and camaraderie of a mountain lodge bar.
title: Frazier's bar is at the bottom of Lionshead Mountain.
